abilitiesRevealed.description: Robin creates twelve arms that sprout from surfaces or opponents to restrain, attack, or manipulate them. In this episode, she uses this technique during the battle against Jigoro and Inuppe.
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Demonstrates Robin's ability to create multiple limbs simultaneously for combat purposes.

keyMoments.title: Robin Uses Doce Fleur in Battle
keyMoments.description: Robin employs her Doce Fleur technique to battle the powerful zombies Jigoro and Inuppe, showcasing her tactical use of multiple sprouted arms.

keyMoments.title: Moria's Deal with Hogback Revealed
keyMoments.description: The episode reveals that Moria used his Kage Kage no Mi powers to resurrect Cindry as part of his agreement with Hogback, demonstrating how he uses his Devil Fruit ability to manipulate others into serving him.

keyMoments.title: Shadow Personality Can Be Resisted
keyMoments.description: Cindry's original consciousness surfaces despite being animated by a shadow, revealing that the Kage Kage no Mi's control is not absolute and that strong emotions or will can cause the original personality to resist.
